name: Golden Wolflord
desc:
Hailing from a dark world, this ruler of the black wolves has the power to call upon its followers, its hidden claws, to dissolve space itself and forge a rift through which it may enter.
The Wolflord has no name, for it was but one of "Gold"'s unintentional creations, and that is precisely why it is obsessed with invading worlds that do not belong to it and making a name for itself.
That said, the wolf pack is far from unintelligent. After suffering a defeat in its previous invasion, a deserted island where no humans or protectors dwell has been selected for them to prepare for their lord's descent.

value.name: Golden Wolflord
value.desc:
"King of the Riftwolves" Golden Wolflord

A twisted beast from another world. This creature is the ruler of the Riftwolves, and wields the power to command them to dissolve space itself.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Riftborn Regalia
dropMaterial.desc:
A broken horn that you obtained from defeating the Wolflord. That said, it should not have left anything behind after your hunt.
Even a lord among the Riftwolves is nothing before monsters of a higher pedigree.
"Gold" mass-produced these malformed wolf packs almost as if by accident, like shrunken drawings on discarded sheets of paper, and the horns on this one represent its authority to command its dark brood to dissolve space itself.

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

customize.text: The king of the Riftwolves. The Golden Wolflord's attacks can apply stacks of the "Corrosion" status, which will cause all characters in the party to continuously lose HP. In combat, the Wolflord will summon Rifthound Skulls to provide it with shields. It can also enter the Elemental Devourer state, which will decrease its Geo RES and increase its offensive capabilities. Attack the Rifthound Skulls with <color=#ffe14b>Geo DMG</color> to destroy the Golden Wolflord's shields swiftly.

<color=#ffd780>Inugami's End</color>
Destroy two Rifthound Skulls within a short time.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>The Whisperer in Darkness</color>
Defeat the Golden Wolflord in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
